mapper.sql: id, operator_no, operator_name, operator_password, operator_role_id, master_no, master_role_id, email, tel, head_image, remark, valid_status, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_operator
id,
operator_no,
operator_name,
operator_password,
operator_role_id,
master_no,
master_role_id,
email,
tel,
head_image,
remark,
valid_status,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{operatorPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{operatorRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{masterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{masterRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aesEmailKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aesPhoneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
#{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{validStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update sys_operator
operator_no = #{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
operator_password = #{operatorPassword,jdbcType=CHAR},
operator_role_id = #{operatorRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
master_no = #{masterNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
master_role_id = #{masterRoleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aesEmailKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
tel = HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{aesPhoneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR})),
head_image = #{headImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operator_no, operator_name, operator_role_id, master_no, master_role_id, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(email),#{aesEmailKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) email, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(tel),#{aesPhoneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tel, head_image, remark, valid_status from sys_operator where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select sys_operator.id, operator_no, operator_name, operator_role_id, master_no, master_role_id, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(email),#{aesEmailKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) email, AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(tel),#{aesPhoneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) tel, head_image, sys_operator.remark, sys_operator.valid_status, sys_operator.gmt_create, role_name from sys_operator, sys_role where operator_role_id = role_id and operator_no = #{operatorNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
